personal.name: Varuntej Reddy N
personal.title: Frontend / Full-Stack Developer
personal.subtitle: AI-Enabled Web Applications
personal.bio: Frontend and full-stack developer with freelance experience building production React and Next.js applications for real businesses. Comfortable owning end-to-end delivery from UI and performance optimization to deployment and analytics.

highlights: Designed and developed responsive landing pages using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
Improved page load performance and SEO, achieving Lighthouse performance scores above 90 on mobile for client websites
Planned and optimized Google Ads and Meta Ads campaigns, iterating on UI and content using GA4
Worked directly with business owners to independently deliver development and deployment

projects.title: MedRAG — AI Healthcare Diagnosis Copilot
projects.tagline: RAG-based medical QA platform with sub-second query latency
projects.description: An AI-powered healthcare diagnosis assistant built using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture. Features a 4.4GB FAISS vector index for fast medical knowledge retrieval with JWT authentication and rate limiting.
highlights: Built a RAG-based medical QA web application using a 4.4GB FAISS vector index with sub-second query latency
Implemented JWT authentication, rate limiting, and session management in a FastAPI backend
Deployed the application using Docker on AWS (EC2, S3, RDS)

projects.title: Jharoka Heritage Furniture
projects.description: A beautiful single-page furniture showcase website with animated sections, image galleries, and mobile-first design for a heritage furniture business.
highlights: Built a single-page furniture showcase with animated sections, image galleries, and mobile-first design
Integrated contact forms, Google Maps, and customer testimonials
Optimized for SEO and performance

projects.title: KMCE Cricket Portal
projects.tagline: Tournament management platform for college cricket
projects.description: A comprehensive tournament management platform with team dashboards, admin workflows, and role-based access control built for college cricket tournaments.
highlights: Developed a tournament platform with team dashboards, admin workflows, and role-based access
Implemented Supabase authentication and SQL-backed storage
Real-time score updates and match scheduling

projects.title: The Grind Cafe
projects.description: SEO-optimized business website for a multi-location cafe with location pages, menu showcase, and contact integration.
highlights: Developed and deployed an SEO-optimized website for a multi-location cafe business
Achieved Lighthouse score above 90 on mobile
Integrated Google Maps and contact forms

projects.title: PartCart
projects.description: A responsive food-ordering and catering inquiry platform currently in development, featuring cart management and order processing.
highlights: Building a responsive food-ordering and catering inquiry platform
Implementing cart management and checkout flow
Mobile-first design with smooth animations
Focus on Web Development and AI/ML
Active in college technical clubs and events

achievements.title: Lighthouse Performance Score 90+
achievements.description: Consistently achieved 90+ Lighthouse scores on mobile for all client projects

achievements.title: Sub-second Query Latency
achievements.description: Built RAG system with 4.4GB vector index achieving sub-second response times

testimonials.name: Client Name
testimonials.content: Varuntej delivered a beautiful, fast website that perfectly represents our brand. The SEO improvements brought in more customers.

contact.title: Let's Build Something Together
contact.description: I'm currently available for freelance projects and full-time opportunities. Whether you need a performant web application, AI integration, or digital marketing optimization, let's talk.

seo.title: Varuntej Reddy N | Frontend & Full-Stack Developer
seo.description: Frontend and full-stack developer specializing in React, Next.js, and AI-enabled web applications. Based in Hyderabad, building production apps for real businesses.
